name: Space Fuel (itch)
description:
Small minimalist arcade Shoot 'Em Up. Pilot your ship through waves of enemies!

Simple Controls:
  • WASD or Arrow keys to move 
  • Space to shoot
  • Controllers are also supported!
5 Different enemy ships:

Meet 5 enemy ships with different weapons and attack patterns

Beat your high score:

See how far you can go. Beat your high score.

Leave Feedback:

Feel free to leave your feedback. What you like/don't like about this game. This will help make it better!

Also follow me on  Twitter for more updates and gamedev content ;)

Note:
This is an early demo. This game is still in development. Currently there is only one Boss and no power ups/upgrades. All of that will come in the future.

Credits:

  • Amazing chiptune soundtrack by Juhani Junkala
  • Font: Kenney Pixel by Kenney
